MIME element (text/plain)
Hello Sir, 
 
I am the legal owner of inetzeal.com and own this site since last one
year. 
My site is indexed by popular search engines. Also archived at
archive.org, Recently i noticed that some one who is your client is
using content of our site directly for this site., the site name is
seoserviceworld.com, our content is already copyrighted and it can't be
used without prior permissions. 
 
The domain is registered with net4domains.com and hosted with
realinfoware.com according to whois record. And Whois info shows that
website seoserviceworld.com is hosted with your server. I expect proper
actions against this abuse. as otherwise we will have to take legal
actions with your client. 
 
Thanks for your support. 
 
--
Best Regards,
Manish Mathukiya
info@inetzeal.com
Phone: 091-2692-229008 x 001
http://www.inetzeal.com/
